document_data.mainbody:
Zarimtar StreetZarmitar Street is used less frequently is some sources and it believed to be a typo. was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Zarimtar Street was located in the south section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward. It originated on Sul Street where it branched west to end at a large intersection that included the Sutherlane, Feather Street, Darselune Street, and Haltovar Street. Mendever Street crossed Zarimtar Street near its midpoint and Cloaksweep Alley connected with it just north of the Courtyard of the Well.
